#summary How to download your Google Location History data in JSON format
#labels json,takeout

= Introduction =
WorldTracker uses the JSON data produced by [https://www.google.com/settings/takeout Google Takeout].

= How to get the data =
  # Go to https://www.google.com/settings/takeout
  # Click "Create an archive"
  # Deselect everything except Location History (under Other)
  # You will get an email when the file is prepared
  # Unzip the file into the same folder as WorldTracker
  # By default WorldTracker will load this filename
